resources.string: Welcome to the Wooly Fair moon rock hunt! Look for barcodes scattered throughout the fair. When you find one, scan it using the \'capture\' button. If you find them all, you\'ll win a prize!
Keep looking! There are still %d cards still scattered around the fair.
You already found %s! Try looking somewhere else.
What planet are you on?? I don\'t even know what that is. Try looking somewhere else.
